Subject: Question regarding the appliance/installation agent.
Description:
Good morning,

I hope this message finds you well.

I am currently using the trial version of the tool and have a question:

Does the Appliance allocated to my hypervisor need to remain turned on at all times?

I’ve noticed that every time I turn off my DLP Appliance and turn it back on, a new IP is generated. As a result, the agent installed with the previous IP loses communication with the console.

Could you guide me on how to handle this situation?

Thank you!
What_We_Know__c: Answered customer's question regarding Does the Appliance allocated to my hypervisor need to remain turned on at all times?
Next_Steps__c: Awaiting customer response to see if customer has further questions
Solution_Comment__c: Customer had questions regarding using the trial version. Answered the questions and customer is satisfied with the information provided and requested to close ticket.
